Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoActivityStreamService provides various ways to retrieve an activity stream.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the logged-in user.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the logged-in user with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the activity stream.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the given user.

Parameter.Name: personIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The user name to be used to retrieve the user's activity stream.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the given user with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: personIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The user name to be used to retrieve the user's activity stream.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the activity stream.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the given site.

Parameter.Name: site
Parameter.Abstract: The site to be used to retrieve the site's activity stream.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all activities for the given site with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: site
Parameter.Abstract: The site to be used to retrieve the site's activity stream.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the activity stream.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the activity stream in case the operation succeeds.
